flawed_nl_solution:
Tammy picks 10 trees x 12 oranges/tree = <<10*12=120>>120 oranges per day.
Tammy sells 120 oranges/day / 6 oranges/pack = <<120/6=20>>20 6-packs of oranges a day
Tammy sells 20 packs/day x 7 days/week = <<20*7=104>>104 6-packs a week
In 3 weeks Tammy sells 104 packs/week x 3 weeks = <<104*3=312>>312 6 -packs
Tammy makes 312 packs x $2/pack = $<<312*2=624>>624
#### 624

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 140, not 104. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
